Sentencas: A number of bolt-microtubular anode supports (BMASs) are manufactured by winding the corresponding thin tapes on threaded rods of different thread pitches and depths, followed by co-lamination using isostatic press.
Titulo: Boosting the performance of bolt-microtubular solid oxide fuel cells through surface pattern tuning

Sentencas: Bolt-microtubular cells (BMCs) are also constructed on BMASs to investigate the effects of the created surface patterns on the cell performance and microstructure.
Titulo: Boosting the performance of bolt-microtubular solid oxide fuel cells through surface pattern tuning

Sentencas: The bolt-microtubular cell, whose anode support is patterned by using a threaded rod with 0.8 mm thread pitch and 0.4 mm thread depth, exhibits similar to 92% higher maximum performance than that of the reference cell at 800 degrees C under 0.3 NL/min hydrogen flow and stagnant air.
Titulo: Boosting the performance of bolt-microtubular solid oxide fuel cells through surface pattern tuning

Sentencas: The almost doubled performance is mainly due to the increase in anode-electrolyte and cathode-electrolyte interfacial areas by the surface patterns created.
Titulo: Boosting the performance of bolt-microtubular solid oxide fuel cells through surface pattern tuning

Sentencas: The cell is also subjected to a 200-h life test at 800 degrees C and 0.7 V and demonstrates a stable performance.
Titulo: Boosting the performance of bolt-microtubular solid oxide fuel cells through surface pattern tuning
